long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spectrum Mute - Mute bot or user per right click

Chrome Web Store: https://goo.gl/yt4SnW
Firefox (addons.mozilla.org): https://goo.gl/dvUrzu (review pending!)

How to video: https://youtu.be/UfkmjqG3czg

This is a customization for Star Citizen members. If you're not yet part of Star Citizen, a science fiction space sim project from Chris Roberts, the creator of the Wing Commander series, you may find more info below and maybe join as well:

https://robertsspaceindustries.com/enlist?referral=STAR-MNBP-SZH9

New messages are removed when you change user names with right click or the text field.
To remove old messages reload the page.
